title: Board Feet (Metric Equivalent)
summary: Convert metric dimensions into board feet for mixed-spec timber.
whenToUse: Use when suppliers quote in board feet but your measurements are metric.
howToUse: Convert to board feet using the standard factor.
steps: Divide by 2,359,737 to get board feet.
commonMistakes: Using metres instead of millimetres without converting.
Forgetting board feet is a volume measure.
siteTips: Keep metric as the primary record for clarity.
Round up when ordering to allow for trim.
verification: A standard 90×45×2.4 m piece is around 3.7 bd ft.
